abstract: Officials at Clinton Foundation are reviewing tax returns going back several years amid scrutiny over donations made by foreign governments during Hillary Clinton's tenure as secretary of state.
lead_paragraph: The review follows the discovery of errors involving the charities’ reporting of grants from foreign governments during Hillary Rodham Clinton’s tenure as secretary of state.

headline.main: Clinton Charities Review Tax Returns Amid Scrutiny of Foreign Grants
headline.print_headline: Clinton Charities Review Tax Returns Amid Scrutiny of Foreign Grants

snippet: The review follows the discovery of errors involving the charities’ reporting of grants from foreign governments during Hillary Rodham Clinton’s tenure as secretary of state.
